resources.string: The email you entered isn’t registered, please contact your recruiter.
Thank you for taking the quiz, you will soon receive an email from our recruitment team

array.name: rules_list
array.item: Each question will have it’s own countdown timer.
The countdown timer is located on the top right corner of the screen.
Once the timer runs out, you cannot answer that question.
Each question will have 4 options, out of which one will be correct.
Once a question is answered, you cannot change your option.
After choosing an option, press submit to submit your answer.
Once a question is answered, press next to move to next question.
